description.name: adabep20
description.tagline: Cardano bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-ada Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Cardano bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/ada receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/ada wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
